Content: The Predator 4 is an upcoming American science fiction action horror film directed by Shane Black and written by Black and Fred Dekker. It is the fourth installment in the Predator film series, following 1987 Predator, 1990 Predator 2 and 2010 Predators. Black had a supporting role in the original 1987 Predator film, while John Davis returns as producer from the first three installments, and Lawrence Gordon serving as executive producer.The film stars Boyd Holbrook, Trevante Rhodes, Jacob Tremblay, Keegan-Michael Key, Olivia Munn, Sterling K. Brown, Alfie Allen, and Thomas Jane. It is set to be released on September 14, 2018 by 20th Century Fox in IMAX as well as standard formats.
